1.「義賊のヤツらめ……。| なぜ このオレが あの偽善者どもに| 引けを とらなき: You righteous bastards. Why should I take|the back seat to these hypocrites?

2.「オレが 間違ってるっていうのか！？| 答えろよ ギャスモン！: You think I'm wrong? Answer me, Gasmon!

3.「答エナド 必要ナイ。| 汝ハ 求メレバ 得ラレルノダ。| ソノ欲望コソガ 汝ノ: A. You have to answer. If you ask, you shall|get. That desire is your leverage.

4.「へへっ そうか。それじゃあ| 今よりも 強い魔物を操るチカラをくれ！| 旅団を: Heh heh . Then give me the power to control|demons stronger than I am now! I'm gonna|make the brigade even bigger!

5.「マタ 魔物ヲ 操ルちからカ……。| ソロソロ 汝自身 強クナル| 必要ガ アル: You have the power to control demons. You|need to strengthen yourself, don't you?

6.「ソノ手デ 憎シミヲ 断ツタメニ……。: With your own hands, you can cut off the|hatred.

7.「ホウラ……。ソノコトヲ告ゲル| 使者ガ 来タヨウダ……。: Hora. A messenger came to tell you that.

8.「何しにきやがった。| オレを 正しい道に進ませようとか| ふざけたこと 考えて: What are you doing here? Don't you dare try|to set me on the right path.

9.「チッ！ 親父と同じ 偽善者の目……。| その目を見てると むしずが走るぜ！|:
Shit! You have the same hypocritical eyes as|my father. I can feel a twinge of venom in|my gut when I look into your eyes! Do you|
|know what my father did?

10.「ムーチョが 町長の家に盗みに入った日……| オレの母さんは 生死の境を さまよ: The day Mucho robbed the mayor's house... My|mother was between life and death. ... The|end of years of illness.

11.「うちは 貧乏でよ。薬を買う金もなかった……。| そんなとき 町長の財宝を持った: We were poor. We had no money for medicine.|Then Mucho came to our house with the|mayor's treasure. I did a little dance.

12.「……けどよ！ ムーチョは……| 親父は 母さんの まくらもとに立っても| 何も: ... But hey! Mucho... Dad stood over Mom's|sleeper and left without leaving anything|behind!

13.「次の日に 母さんは 死んだよ。| 親父は泣いてたが 今思えば あのときの涙も|: The next day, she died. Dad was crying, but|looking back, I'm sure his tears were just a|trick.

14.「オレは ムーチョへの復讐を誓い 家を出た。| ……そして ここにいるギャスモン: I swore revenge on Mucho, and I went home.|... And then I met Gasmon here, and he gave|me the power to control demons!

15.「盗賊なんて しょせん悪党……。| そのことを 世間に教えてやるために| つむじ: Thieves are just villains. That's why I|formed the Whirlwind Brigade.

16.「でもよ…… もう つむじ風の旅団なんて| まわりくどいことは やめるぜ。| オ: But you know... I'm done with this Whirlwind|Brigade bullshit. I'm going to kill you all|myself!

17.「ギャスモン！ さあ オレにチカラをくれ！| こいつらを ひねりつぶすための|: GASMON! Come on, give me the power! I need|to find a way to crush them.

19.「おお…… みなぎる みなぎるぞ！！！| 黒いチカラが オレの身体に………ッ！！: Oh... I'm so pumped, I'm so pumped, I'm so|pumped! The black power in my body... Aah!

21.「ブルルルルッ！| すべての義賊に 死を……！| 死を 死をォォォ…………ッ！！: Brrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr! Death to all|the bandits! Death! Death! Death!

22.「ブルルルルッ！！ 何度来ても同じこと！| 貴様ら 義賊は オレには勝てん！！|:
Brrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr! I keep|coming back and it's the same thing! You|righteous bastards are no match for me! I'm|
|the one who's right!

23.「ブルルルルッ！| すべての義賊に 死を……！| 死を 死をォォォ…………ッ！！: Brrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr! Death to all|the bandits! Death! Death! Death!

24.「ブ…ブルルルル……。| 憎しみに身をまかせ チカラを得た| このオレが なぜ:
Bu... Brrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr. How could I,|a man who has given himself over to hatred|and gained power, turn into a righteous|
|bandit?

25.「憎しみが 足りないのか……？| 義賊を…… 親父を 憎む心が……。: Not enough hatred...? For the bandit... You|hate your father.

26.「この バカ息子ーーーーー！！！: You stupid son of a bitch!

27.「アンタは 母親の思いを 踏みにじる気かい！！| 妻を救えなかった 親父さんの気:
You're not going to let your mother's|feelings get in the way of your own! Did you|ever think for a second how your father felt|
|when he couldn't save his wife?

28.「アンタの親父さんね このままじゃいけないって| あたいに 真相を話してくれたよ: Your father told me the truth. You, too,|listen to me with your ears open!

29.「……町長の家に盗みに入った あの日| ワシは お前の母を 助けられるだけのカネ: ... The day I robbed the mayor's house, I|tried to leave enough money to save your|mother.

31.「私たちの約束を 忘れたのですか……。| そう言って カネを置いていくことを|: Have you forgotten our agreement? And he|strongly objected to you leaving the money|behind.

32.「約束……？| 約束って なんだよ……？: Promise...? What do you mean by promise...?

33.「ワシが ムーチョになると決めたとき| 妻は いっさいの盗品を 自分たちのために: When I decided to become Mucho, my wife|asked me to promise not to use any of the|stolen goods for ourselves.

34.「盗んだものを 少しでも 自分たちのために| 使ってしまえば それは義賊ではなく: If they use any of the stolen goods for|themselves, they are not righteous thieves,|but only slobs... That's what he said.

35.「そして 私利私欲のために 動くのではなく| 人のために尽くすことを 固く誓い|: And I became Mucho with a firm commitment to|serve others, not for personal gain.

36.「ねえ チャムール。| ふたりの心意気……。| アンタには もう わからないのか: Hey Cha. The spirit of the two of you. Don't|you get it anymore?

37.「この オルゴールの音色を聞いても| 母親の優しさを 思いだせなかったのかい？: Did the sound of this music box not remind|you of your mother's kindness?

40.「憎シミノ心ガ 消エタ……。| コノ器ハ 使エヌ。欲望ガ足リヌ……。: The hateful heart is gone. This vessel... It|does not have enough desire.

42.「すまなかったなあ チャムール……。| もう お前を ひとりにはせん。| やり直: I'm sorry, Chamur. I'll leave you alone.|Leave you alone. With me.

43.「……グスッ。ダメだね……。| あたい こういうのには 弱いんだ。: .... No good. I'm not good at this kind of|thing.

44.「……さてと これにて 一件落着だね。| つむじ風の旅団も いなくなったし| ブ: ... Well, that's it. We're done. The|Whirlwind Brigade is gone, and the rancor|between the Budechos has dissipated.

45.「<cs_pchero> 今回も また大活躍だったね。| その礼をするからさ|: <cs_pchero> You've done a great job|again. I'll be sure to thank you by coming|to Gatara's Bar.

47.「<pc>よ。| お前には オルゴールの件や| 今回の件で 本当に 世話になった: <pc>. you've been a big help to|me with the music box and this whole thing.

48.「その恩返しに 盗賊の必殺技を| お前に 伝授しよう。| さあ 目を つむるがよ: And to repay the favor, I'm going to teach|you the special move of the bandit. Now,|close your eyes.

50.「その恩返しに これを受け取ってくれ。| 大事に 使うんだぞ。: I received this in return. I'll use it with|care.

51.「お前は 盗賊を極められる器だ。| 時が満ちたら ワシの所へ来るがいい。| もち: You're the best thief I've ever seen. When|the time is right, you will come to me. Of|course, I'll remember to be a thief.

52.「とっておきの 試練を用意しといてやろう。| では またな。: Prepare yourself for a trial by fire. See|you later.

53.「ブ…ブデチョのオッサン！| あ！ いや！ ムーチョ先生っ！！: Bu... Budecho's old man! Ah! No! No! Mr.|Mucho!

54.「あたいを 弟子にしてくれないかい！？| あたい マスク・ド・ムーチョに あこが: Will you take me as your apprentice? I was|so fascinated by Masc de Mucho that I jumped|into this world! Please!

55.「すまんな。ワシは もう| 弟子は とらないことにしてるんだ。: I'm sorry. I've decided not to take on any|more disciples.

56.「もう……ってことは| すでに お弟子さんが いるのかい！？: Already... Does that mean you already have a|disciple?

57.「どこで ワシの正体を知ったのか| ちょっと前に 怪盗ポイなんとかって女の子が|:
I don't know where she found out who I am,|but a little while ago, a girl called|"Phantom Thief Poi something" came to my|
|place.

58.「もともと 弟子をとるつもりは なかったが| かわいい顔で 熱心に頼みこんできた:
I had no intention of taking on an|apprentice, but when he asked me so|enthusiastically with his cute little face,|
|I couldn't resist.

59.「ところが そのコ なかなか スジがよくて| 今は 彼女の指導で 手いっぱいなん: But this girl is pretty cool, and right now|I've got my hands full teaching her. That's|why I'm sorry Ha-ha-ha.
